about_the_game:
Purchasing this add-on unlocks the commentary character："Usada Pekora"

Usada Pekora Takes Over Treasure Mountain!?

The immensely popular hololive talent "Usada Pekora",

makes a surprise debut in "hololive Treasure Mountain" as a commentary character!

Her iconic and sometimes wacky lines will make the game even more exciting!

About Usada Pekora's "Hiya-Peko DLC"

You'll be able to select the new commentary character "Usada Pekora".

When you set "Usada Pekora" as the commentary character,

she will appear on screen during gameplay and cheerfully provide commentary while accompanied by a brand-new Pekora-themed BGM!

When you create "The biggest treasure,"

the special treasure voice will also change to Usada Pekora's version,

and there's even a brand-new Pekora-themed opening!

This DLC is packed full of all things Pekora!

※You can change the commentary character from the title by selecting:

　"Marine's Treasures" > "Select Commentator".

It has been approved for distribution and monetization under the guidelines and regulations of ""holo Indie"".
